websiteTextConfiguration.userRegistrationEthicsAgreementLabel: I confirm that I have read the ethics agreement and consent to taking part in this survey.
websiteTextConfiguration.confirmButtonErrorMessageWithSkip: You must select at least one of the items or skip this comparison by using the Skip button.
websiteTextConfiguration.confirmButtonErrorMessageWithoutSkip: You must select at least one of the items.
websiteTextConfiguration.skipButtonErrorMessage: You cannot skip a comparison if any items are selected. Unselect the items to skip the comparison or use the Confirm button to confirm the current selection.
websiteTextConfiguration.additionalCheckboxInstructions: The two items in the group are checkboxes.
websiteTextConfiguration.additionalRadioButtonInstructions: The two items in the radio group function as radio buttons however, if a selected radio button is clicked again, then it will be unselected returning the group to an all-unselected state.
websiteTextConfiguration.thankYouOpeningText: Thank you for contributing to this research.
websiteTextConfiguration.thankYouContinueText: If you would like to continue with more comparisons please click the continue button below. If not, please log out to end the session.
websiteTextConfiguration.thankYouStopText: There are no more comparisons available. Please log out to end the session.
websiteTextConfiguration.siteCookiesText: This website requires cookies to function. By using this website, you accept our use of cookies. See the Policies page for more information.
websiteTextConfiguration.error500Message: Sorry, something went wrong on our system. Please try again later.
websiteTextConfiguration.error204Message: You must be familiar with at least two of the items to continue with the comparisons. Please try starting the process again using the link below.
